solution.text:
\(_{j}_x + _{{Fraction(k,l)}}_ = _{{Fraction(m,n)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow _{j}_x = _{{Fraction(m,n)}}_-_{{Fraction(k,l)}}_\) [Taking \(_{{Fraction(k,l)}}_\) to the RHS]
\(\Rightarrow _{j}_x = _{{Fraction(((m*l)-(k*n)),(l*n))}}_\)
Dividing both sides by _{j}_:
\(x= _{{Fraction(((m*l)-(k*n)),(l*n*j))}}_\)
